title: Megadimension Neptunia VII + Update 2 + 14 DLC, FIXED
body:
Megadimension Neptunia VII + Update 2 + 14 DLC, FIXED

Company: Idea Factory
Languages: ENG/JAP
Original Size: 13.3 GB
Repack Size: from 4.4 GB [Selective Download]

Download mirrors:

ExtraTorrent — Magnet — .torrent only
Tapochek.net
Free-torrents

  • Filehoster: TrainBit (Main setup files – Uploaded by Gamemaniacs)
  • Filehoster: OpenLoad (Main setup files – Uploaded by Gamemaniacs)
  • Filehoster: TrainBit (Optional/Selective files – Uploaded by Gamemaniacs)
  • Filehoster: OpenLoad (Optional/Selective files – Uploaded by Gamemaniacs)

    Screenshots (Click to enlarge)

    Repack Features

    • Based on Megadimension.Neptunia.VII-CODEX ISO release: codex-megadimension.neptunia.vii.iso (13,848,182,784 bytes)
    • Digital Deluxe Set DLC (Wallpapers, Artbook, OST – 390 MB), missing from CODEX release, added
    • Updates 1 & 2 (Revision 345) installed
    • Alternative cracks from 3DM and ALI213 available in NoDVD folder after installation
    • All 14 (13 in-game) DLCs included and activated (check in-game DLC menu for deactivation). New repack has the DLC actually working
    • 100% Lossless but NOT MD5 Perfect: game resources were unpacked to enable proper recompression; downsides – more HDD space occupied + no xdelta-patching in the future; upside – easy modding. No perfomance loss due to unpacked resources in this case.
    • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
    • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of voice and/or bonus files you don’t need
    • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 13.3 to 4.4~5.9 GB, (depending on selected components)
    • Installation takes 15-40 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
    • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
    • HDD space after installation: 25 GB

    Backwards compatibility

    This repack is heavily backwards compatible with initial one. Only 2 small files were changed: setup-fitgirl-13.bin & setup.exe. Also, one file was added: setup-fitgirl-14.bin. So you can just rehash the old repack with this new one.

    If you don’t want to rehash, just download new/changed files here: http://www82.zippyshare.com/v/YKa9jGKn/file.html

    Unpack this ZIP to repack installer folder, then erase all files in target game folder you have (but save OfflineStorage or Profile folders inside, if you were using 3DM or ALI213 cracks) and then reinstall the game.
